Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.scene

Class PreparePhaseSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.scene.PreparePhaseSceneController
public class PreparePhaseSceneController extends Object
FXML injected class that defines the behaviour of the various elements of the "choose a mage" screen.

  • Constructor Details

    • PreparePhaseSceneController

      public PreparePhaseSceneController(javafx.beans.binding.ListBinding<Mage> availableMages, javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyBooleanProperty hasPendingMessages, javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyBooleanProperty rejoining, Map<Mage,javafx.scene.image.Image> mageImages, Consumer<String> onChooseMage, Runnable afterEnd)
      Creates a new instance with the given resources
      Parameters:
      availableMages - a binding containing all the pickable mages
      hasPendingMessages - a binding indicating whether the server has any pending messages
      rejoining - a boolean property indicating whether this lobby is waiting for other players to join it
      mageImages - a map associating each mage with its graphic
      onChooseMage - a callback for when the mage has been selected by the user
      afterEnd - a callback for when the user clicks "to main menu" after a game has ended
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null
